        @NonNull
public Set<CQLWord> fieldToVariables(@NonNull
                                              Field field)
        Description copied from interface: Mapping
        Maps the given field to one or more variables in a write bound statement.
        Specified by:
        fieldToVariables in interface Mapping
        Parameters:
        field - the field to find the variable for.
        Returns:
        the bound statement variables the given field maps to, or an empty collection if the field does not map to any known bound statement variable.

        Specified by:
        variableToFields in interface Mapping
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • codec

        @NonNull
public <T> TypeCodec<T> codec(@NonNull
                                       CQLWord variable,
                                       @NonNull
                                       DataType cqlType,
                                       @NonNull
                                       GenericType<? extends T> javaType)
        Description copied from interface: Mapping
        Returns the codec to use for the given bound statement or row variable.

        Note that the given variable name must be supplied unquoted, even if it requires quoting to comply with the syntax of CQL identifiers.

        Specified by:
        codec in interface Mapping
        Type Parameters:
        T - the codec's Java type.
        Parameters:
        variable - the bound statement or row variable; never null.
        cqlType - the CQL type; never null.
        javaType - the Java type; never null.
        Returns:
        the codec to use; never null.
